In childhood I liked to play with dolls or keep small animals
In adolescence I seriously helped strangers or helpless people
At work I like to do things so people don't get reprimanded, help them in problems or solve their issues
After all, when others need me, how can I say 'no' to them?
My prominent characteristic is that wherever someone needs help, they can count on me with all my strength
My main motivation for marrying is having children
To me marriage is the guarantor and supporter of children - love alone is not enough
In relationship with my children, if something happens to them I blame myself that if I had been more careful this wouldn't have happened to my child
When my children are outside I have severe anxiety that something might happen to them and I'm always worried
The most important subject of my life is to always be a model parent and do everything I can for my children
My happiness and satisfaction comes when I know my children have no problems in life and have a very good life
My wish for middle age and old age is that my children be around me, and if I don't have children my life loses its meaning
I don't have personal entertainment and recreation for myself
When I see a hurt child or even a wounded or hungry bird, dog or cat, I get very upset
If a mother mistreats her child, or an adult behaves inappropriately with a child, I get very disturbed and interfere
People around me are lazy and irresponsible and I do all their work, even personal, for them
Though I don't want to boast, I must admit I do many things for others, but if they're ungrateful and don't pay attention, I get upset
I like to invite guests and cook for them and greatly enjoy hosting family, relatives and friends
At parties I'm careful that everyone has a good time
I always try to know what's happening to my loved ones
Since I don't go out much, my clothing and makeup aren't very important
Many tell me that in relationship with my spouse I'm more his mother than his wife
Even if my children grow up, they're still children to me and I do their personal work and feel infinite satisfaction from taking care of them
I ask God to give me strength, energy, facilities and suitable conditions so I can serve others, especially weak and helpless people
My physical health and financial situation often get damaged because I value others' needs more than my own
